allow: Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT name, brand, unit_type, unit_size, case_size FROM master_products LIMIT 10;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name=''master_products'' AND column_name LIKE ''%search%'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT name, brand, category, unit_type, unit_size, case_size, COUNT(*) as count FROM master_products WHERE active = true GROUP BY name, brand, category, unit_type, unit_size, case_size HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT supplier_id, supplier_sku, COUNT(*) as count, COUNT(DISTINCT master_product_id) as master_count FROM supplier_item_list WHERE active = true GROUP BY supplier_id, supplier_sku HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as orphaned_records FROM supplier_item_list sil WHERE sil.active = true AND sil.master_product_id IS NOT NULL AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM master_products mp WHERE mp.id = sil.master_product_id AND mp.active = true);")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT ''master_products'' as table_name, COUNT(*) as active_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN created_by_id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as with_creator FROM master_products WHERE active = true UNION ALL SELECT ''supplier_item_list'' as table_name, COUNT(*) as active_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN verified = true THEN 1 END) as verified_count FROM supplier_item_list WHERE active = true;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as venue_count FROM venues; SELECT COUNT(*) as supplier_count FROM suppliers; SELECT COUNT(*) as invoice_count FROM invoices;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT id, invoice_number, venue_id, supplier_id, created_at FROM invoices LIMIT 3;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as line_item_count FROM invoice_line_items WHERE invoice_id = ''119a961d-b3db-4681-abeb-5b0d328a5765'';")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT id, supplier_name, auto_matched, confidence_score, master_product_id FROM supplier_item_list WHERE id IN (28, 56, 29) LIMIT 5;")
